Node.definition: = referent to the time after the event in focus
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ► king of Ammon (עַמֹּון) time of Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
= man; ◄ son of Nahash (נָחָשׁ) ► king of Ammon (עַמֹּון) who humiliated David (דָּוִד) emissaries and so became David's enemy
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= particle linking two propositions X and Y, by which Y represents the purpose or result of X

Node.gloss: to look for|to try out|to test|to search out|to explore|to investigate|to examine|to cross examine|to sound out|to determine
Node.definition: = action by which someone tries to obtain information about a certain object, person, or event by examining it carefully
= causative action by which humans or deities destroy an object completely ◄ as if by turning it completely upside down
literally: to move about; hence: = action by which humans go to a certain place ► to carry out a secret assignment

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans cut the hair on all or part of the body of someone else
= causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a generic word for clothing, which in certain contexts may denote a specific kind of clothes, such as someone's tunic or armor
= a location in the middle of an object, on an imaginary division line as if it were divided into two parts
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= the two round fleshy parts of the human body that form the bottom; ≈ associated with shame

Node.gloss: to let go|to dismiss|to send (someone) on his way|to free|to release
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities allow (other) humans to leave a certain place and go home
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= state in which humans experience a feeling of shame, as a result of their own actions or because of what other have done

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= state in which humans remain in a place that is not their home for a relatively short time
= town; ◄ located northwest of the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first town conquered by Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) after they entered Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes
= process by which the hair of one's body grows to a certain length
= a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a mature man’s face, ≈ the absence of which is regarded as shameful
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)
= process by which humans become repulsive or loathsome to someone else ◄ as a result of antagonistic actions ► resulting in enmity between the parties involved
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= causative action by which humans or deities send an object to (other) humans, usually through the mediation of a messenger

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= weight of approximately 30 kilograms, equals 3000 shekels (שֶׁקֶל) or 60 minas (מָנֶה)
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= causative action by which humans obtain the service of other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

= region, also known as Paddan Aram (פַּדַּן אֲרָם) ◄ located in upper Mesopotamia (אֲרַם נַהֲרַיִם) around the great bend of the Euphrates (פְּרָת) River in northern Syria (אֲרָם) ► ancestral home of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) family, homeland of Balaam (בִּלְעָם) the son of Beor (בְּעֹור) and the country of Cushan Rishathaim (כּוּשַׁן רִשְׁעָתַיִם) the first of the kings who oppressed Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in the book of Judges
= Aramean kingdom; ◄ located south of Mt. Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) Valley and north of the Yarmuk

= Aramean kingdom, also known as Aram Zobah (אֲרַם צֹובָא) ◄ located north of Damascus (דַּמֶּשֶׂק) ► ruled by Hadadezer (הֲדַדְעֶזֶר) defeated and subjugated by David (דָּוִד) and then controlled by Solomon
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= soldier riding a horse
= causative action by which humans obtain the service of other humans for a limited amount of time and in return for payment
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person

= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

Node.definition: literally: to arrange the battle; hence: = action by which an army arranges itself in a strategic way
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= state of being integrated but physically detached from other, similar objects or events

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= man; ◄ son of Zeruiah (צְרוּיָה) sister of David (דָּוִד) ► chief of David (דָּוִד) army
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country

= pertaining to a movement in a direction away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces; ≈ since the way the ancient Israelites oriented themselves was facing the East, the term is also often used to denote the West; also associated with failure, unfaithfulness, and outright rebellion
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= person selected from among the young men of a tribe or nation to join the army

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= large body of flowing water ◄ located in Mesopotamia
= man, also known as Shobach (שֹׁובַךְ) ► army commander of Hadadezer (הֲדַדְעֶזֶר) king of Zobah (צֹובָה)
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= man; ◄ son of Rehob (רְחֹב) ► king of Zobah (צֹובָה) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= to bring together people, animals, plants, and/or other things from different places for a common purpose

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

Node.gloss: to draw up a battle line|to draw up in battle order
Node.definition: literally: to arrange the battle; hence: = action by which an army arranges itself in a strategic way
= action by which humans or deities engage in a confrontation with (other) humans
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a person whose main activities take place on foot, as opposed to riding on an animal or in a vehicle

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man, also known as Shobach (שֹׁובַךְ) ► army commander of Hadadezer (הֲדַדְעֶזֶר) king of Zobah (צֹובָה)
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ son of Rehob (רְחֹב) ► king of Zobah (צֹובָה) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= causative action by which humans or animals deliver a heavy blow to other humans or animals, ► resulting in serious harm or injury, and, in the case of an army, defeat

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations
= state in which someone is willing to do something
= land and ethnic group ◄ located in Syria; regarded as descendants of Shem (שֵׁם)
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= nation; ◄ situated E. of river Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) according to founded by Ben Ammi (בֶּן־עַמִּי) son of Lot (לֹוט)
